#summary The wiki home page

ez-vcard is a vCard library written in Java (requires 1.5 or above).  It can read and write vCards in many different formats.  The "ez" stands for "easy" because the goal is to create a library that's easy to use.

This wiki contains documentation describing how to use ez-vcard.  Use the sidebar on the left side of the page to navigate the wiki.  For additional information about ez-vcard's API, please see the Javadocs.
